title: Longbow
data:
{{version031}}{{weapon |name = Longbow |skill = Ranged Weapons |damage = 14 |accuracy = +0 |basedelay = 17 |mindelay = 7 at 20 skill |hands = 2H |size = Large |ranged = Yes |acquirement = 10 }}{{flavour|A long, strong bow made of yew. ---- "Robyn bent a full goode bowe,
An arrowe he drowe at wyll;
He hit so the proud sherife
Upon the grounde he lay full still." -_A Gest of Robyn Hode_ Sixth Fytte, l. 120-123. ca. 1450}} '''Longbows''' are an upgrade over [[shortbow]]s and [[orcbow]]s, dealing more damage. They fire faster than [[arbalest]]s. ==Strategy== Longbows are one of the stronger weapons for a ranged weapons user. At around 16 skill (or higher), a longbow will outdamage an [[arbalest]] against a 0 AC target. An arbalest can still be better if it has higher enchantment, but the base delay introduces [[Heavy#Risks of >1.0 attack delay|risks in combat]]. Of course, a [[triple crossbow]] is more powerful, but it's rarer and requires more skill to reach mindelay. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Longbow 1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Longbow 2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Longbow 3.png]] |- | '''[[Piercer]]''' || [[File:Longbow piercer.png]] |- | '''[[Storm bow]]''' || [[File:Longbow storm bow.png]] |- | '''[[Zephyr]]''' || [[File:Bow of krishna sharnga.png]] |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.31]], longbows had 13 damage and 16 base delay. Also, it was significantly more likely to find a longbow in the early-mid game (as [[centaur warrior]]s could have them.) *Prior to [[0.30]], longbows had 12 damage, 17 base delay, and a mindelay of 6. *In [[0.29]], longbows had their damage and mindelay reduced (previously 15 damage, 7 mindelay) . They were affected by the [[Ranged Weapons#History|ranged weapons rework]] that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated [[Bows (skill)|bows skill]] and [[arrow]] requirement. *Longbows were introduced in [[0.15]]. {{weapons}} [[Category:Bows]]
